com.fdmgroup.springloginregisterexercise.persistence

Interface Users<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - Generic placeholder so that the interface may be used with any object
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    UsersDAO

    public interface Users<T>
    This is the interface for UsersDAO. This interface contains three methods. One method for adding a user. The other method is overloaded. Both version are for finding a user object that has been stored in a database but one method checks only usernames and the other check for username/password combo.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Brian.Albers

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addUser(T t)
      This method writes a User object as a String into a file.
      java.lang.Boolean findUser(java.lang.String username)
      This method uses a list to gather all users in a database and then checks if any of the user's username field patches the supplied username string.
      java.lang.Boolean findUser(java.lang.String username, java.lang.String password)
      This method uses a list to gather all users in a database and then checks if a user's username/password combonation matches a supplied username/password combo.

    • Method Detail

      • addUser

        void addUser(T t)
        This method writes a User object as a String into a file.
        Parameters:
        t - Generic placeholder so that addUser may be use with any object
        See Also:
        UsersDAO

      • findUser

        java.lang.Boolean findUser(java.lang.String username)
        This method uses a list to gather all users in a database and then checks if any of the user's username field patches the supplied username string.
        Parameters:
        username - A username supplied by the client
        Returns:
        A boolean showing whether the username was found or not
        See Also:
        UsersDAO

      • findUser

        java.lang.Boolean findUser(java.lang.String username,
                           java.lang.String password)
        This method uses a list to gather all users in a database and then checks if a user's username/password combonation matches a supplied username/password combo.
        Parameters:
        username - A username supplied by the client
        password - A password supplied by the client
        Returns:
        A boolean showing whether the username/password combo was found or not
        See Also:
        UsersDAO
